name: Relax- Lavender & Aloe 100% Vegan Handmade Cold Process Soap
description:
Treat your skin kindly after a playful day at the beach. The sun can be harsh on your skin. Soothe and moisturize all summer with this bar. 

We have adjusted the pH of this bar so its perfect for the most sensitive of skin- that includes babies and children!!!

Environmental toxins and daily stress can can be harsh on your skin making it appear coarse and inflamed. Lavender can help combat both culprits with a one-two punch. “It contains powerful antioxidants that will prevent and counteract the irritating effects of pollutants on the skin,” explains Claude Saliou, Ph.D. “Plus, studies have shown that elevated stress results in rough skin, so lavender can improve skin by acting as a mentally calming agent.” Try our lavender-infused soap to calm your nerves and your skin.

Aloe Vera has antibiotic, antibacterial and anti-fungal properties and can help prevent or treat infections. High in antioxidants, which can help fight aging. It's soothing and moisturizing

Sea + Sparrow cold process soaps are handmade in small batches free of artificial fragrances or colorants. We use the finest natural ingredients to create 100% vegan friendly lye soap. Due to the handcrafted nature of our soap, each 3.5 oz bar is unique! 

Ingredients: Olive, Coconut, Palm, Castor, and Grapeseed Oils, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye), Aloe Leaf, Aloe Juice, Lavender essential oil + Vitamin E

name: Piquant - Cinnamon + Sweet Orange 100% Vegan Handmade Cold Process Soap
description:
The French word for spicy, Piquant perfectly describes the aroma of this favorite soap.  Ground Arabic Cinnamon acts as an excellent exfoliant, and Cinnamon essential oil increases circulation to the surface of the skin, stimulating it with nutrients from the body.

We add a generous helping of organic, cold pressed Sweet Orange essential oil to promote collagen production and reduce skin inflammation.  This oil is chock full of naturally occurring D-limonene, a proven anti cancer super nutrient. 

Sea + Sparrow cold process soaps are handmade in small batches free of artificial fragrances or colorants. We use the finest natural ingredients to create 100% vegan friendly lye soap. Due to the handcrafted nature of our soap, each 3.5 oz bar is unique! 

Ingredients: Olive, Coconut, Palm, Castor, and Grapeseed Oils, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye), Ground Cinnamon, Cinnamon and Sweet Orange essential oils.

name: Exfoliating - Poppy Seed + Sea Clay 100% Vegan Handmade Cold Process Soap
description:
This soap contains a heaping spoonful of Sea Clay from the Dead Sea, one of the deepest and saltiest bodies of water on Earth.  This clay pulls toxins from your skin while replenishing with over 20 essential minerals found in the Dead Sea.

Whole Poppy Seeds act as a strong, aggressive exfoliant, scrubbing  away dirt and dead skin. Poppy Seeds are an ancient natural sedative, rich in vitamins and unsaturated oils. High linoleic oil content ensures that Poppy Seeds soothe as you scrub, leaving skin soft and glowing.

Sea + Sparrow cold process soaps are handmade in small batches free of artificial fragrances or colorants. We use the finest natural ingredients to create 100% vegan friendly lye soap. Due to the handcrafted nature of our soap, each 3.5 oz bar is unique! 

Ingredients: Olive, Coconut, Palm, Castor, Grapeseed Oils, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye), Poppy Seeds, Dead Sea Clay, Rose and Jasmine essential oils.

name: Detox - Activated Charcoal 100% Vegan Handmade Cold Process Soap
description:
This face and body bar is great for all skin types, but especially good for oily skin.  Activated Charcoal is a strong detoxifying soap, naturally antibacterial, and will extract toxins and impurities from the skin.

We mix in a generous helping of Lavender essential oil - a clinically proven antioxidant. Not only does it smell delicious, it also counteracts the effects of daily pollutants on the skin.  A touch of Eucalyptus essential oil helps clear the sinuses and lungs, leaving you feeling refreshed, smelling well, and smelling great!

Sea + Sparrow cold process soaps are handmade in small batches free of artificial fragrances or colorants. We use the finest natural ingredients to create 100% vegan friendly lye soap. Due to the handcrafted nature of our soap, each 3.5 oz bar is unique! 

Ingredients: Olive, Coconut, Palm, Castor, and Grapeseed Oils, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye), Activated Charcoal, Lavender and Eucalyptus essential oils.

name: Cleansing - French Green Clay 100% Vegan Handmade Cold Process Soap
description:
French Green Clay is quarry mined and sun dried to produce a fine, light green clay used at the finest spas in the world.  Good for normal to oily skin, this clay draws out toxins and tightens pores as it gently exfoliates, leaving skin smooth and moisturized.

A dash of Tea Tree essential oil makes this soap naturally antibacterial and aromatic.  We add Eucalyptus essential oil to stimulate the sinuses and the skin. 

 Sea + Sparrow cold process soaps are handmade in small batches free of artificial fragrances or colorants. We use the finest natural ingredients to create 100% vegan friendly lye soap. Due to the handcrafted nature of our soap, each 3.5 oz bar is unique! 

Ingredients: Olive, Coconut, Palm, Castor, and Grapeseed Oils, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye), French Green Clay, Tea Tree and Eucalyptus essential oils.

name: Mild - Rose Clay + Rosehips 100% Vegan Handmade Cold Process Soap
description:
A mild Kaolin clay, Rose clay is known to clean and purify the skin. Rich in minerals, most notably the Iron that gives the soap a rosy color, this clay acts as a mild exfoliant while also drawing impurities from the skin.

Rosehip, Rose, and Grapefruit essential oils benefit all skin types.  Our skin readily absorbs these rehydrating oils that nourish and treat a variety of dry skin ailments, soothe chapped skin, and even reduce wrinkles! 

Sea + Sparrow cold process soaps are handmade in small batches free of artificial fragrances or colorants. We use the finest natural ingredients to create 100% vegan friendly lye soap. Due to the handcrafted nature of our soap, each 3.5 oz bar is unique! 

Ingredients: Olive, Coconut, Palm, Castor, and Grapeseed Oils, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye),  Rose Clay, Rosehip, Rose, Grapefruit essential oils.

name: Soothing - Oatmeal + Honey 100% Vegan Handmade Cold Process Soap
description:
Oatmeal helps to relieve irritated skin. Contains saponins that naturally cleanse pores and act as a gentle exfoliant. Long known for its ability to soothe skin, Oatmeal is excellent for treating many skin conditions such as psoriasis and rosacea.

We use a Louisiana local organic wildflower honey that we keep in our kitchen to eat as well as use in our soap. Honey acts as a natural antioxidant that boosts your skins ability to rejuvenate & refresh depleted skin, leaving your skin feeling radiant and youthful.

Sea + Sparrow cold process soaps are handmade in small batches free of artificial fragrances or colorants. We use the finest natural ingredients to create 100% vegan friendly lye soap. Due to the handcrafted nature of our soap, each 3.5 oz bar is unique! 

Ingredients: Olive, Coconut, Palm, Castor, and Grapeseed Oils, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye), Oatmeal, Honey.

name: Shaving - Bentonite Clay 100% Vegan Handmade Cold Process Soap
description:
A classic white shaving soap great for all skin types, Bentonite clay aids the razor in gliding across your skin and draws impurities from pores.

To create an extra thick and luxuriant lather for face and body, we add Apricot Kernel oil to our already rich oil base. Tea Tree, Peppermint, and Eucalyptus essential oils make your shave minty and refreshing, while a touch of Jasmine essential oil soothes and replenishes nutrients in the skin.

Sea + Sparrow cold process soaps are handmade in small batches free of artificial fragrances or colorants. We use the finest natural ingredients to create 100% vegan friendly lye soap. Due to the handcrafted nature of our soap, each 3.5 oz bar is unique! 

Ingredients: Olive, Coconut, Palm, Apricot Kernel, Castor, and Grapeseed Oils, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye), Bentonite clay, Tea Tree, Peppermint, Eucalyptus, Jasmine essential oils.

name: Any Four 100% Vegan Handmade Cold Process Soaps
description:
Choose any four of our soaps!

Exfoliating - Poppy Seed & Sea Clay

Cleansing - French Green Clay

Mild - Rose Clay & Rosehips

Detox - Activated Charcoal

Shaving - Bentonite Clay

Soothing - Oatmeal & Honey

Piquant - Cinnamon & Sweet Orange

Sea + Sparrow cold process soaps are handmade in small batches free of artificial fragrances or colorants. We use the finest natural ingredients to create 100% vegan friendly lye soap. Due to the handcrafted nature of our soap, each 3.5 oz bar is unique!

Ingredients: Olive, Coconut, Palm, Castor, Grapeseed Oils, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye)

name: Big Daddy Soap Caddy
description: If your bath is anything like ours, one soap dish just won't cut it! To avoid rust and warping, we used no screws or nails in this handmade beauty.This yellow pine soap caddy is secured with red oak dowels, and finished in water resistant 100% food safe tung oil.  Designed to drain, protect, and separate your soaps!

name: Reclaimed Cypress Jelly Jar Vase
description: This cypress wood and red oak stand holds two jelly jars, and whatever you can think to put in them. We keep our fresh picked herbs or flowers in these and it is rarely empty. Finished in 100% food safe tung oil and sourced from reclaimed wood. Two jelly jars with lids are included.

name: Reclaimed Cypress Three Tealight Container
description: This cypress container holds three tealights.  Finished in 100% tung oil and sourced from reclaimed lumber.

name: Reclaimed Cypress Tealight Box
description: Finished in 100% food safe tung oil, this tealight holder measures approximately 2x2x2 inches square, though each one is unique.  When ordering multiples, please let me know if you would like a similar or varied appearance. If ordering  a single container, you may choose either option.

name: Reclaimed Cypress Hideaway Box
description: This hideaway box is handmade from reclaimed cypress and finished in food safe 100% tung oil.  Perfect for a desk or vanity, this box may be opened by sliding or removing the lid.  Your box will vary slightly from the picture, each one is unique. Dimensions are 2x2x2 inches.

name: Reclaimed Cypress Soap Dish
description: Our cypress soap dish is sourced from reclaimed wood, then finished in food safe, water resistant 100% tung oil.  Cypress is naturally water resistant, an attribute that creates a durable, beautiful wood.  All soap dishes are handcrafted, and sanded to a fine finish, but may vary slightly in appearance from the picture shown. Dimensions are 3x4 inches.

name: Detox Bath
description: Bodily detoxification through bathing is a trusted ancient remedy. Made with Epsom salt, baking soda, eucalyptus oil, lavender oil and lavender.  A detox bath is thought to assist your body in eliminating toxins as well as absorbing the minerals and nutrients that are in the water. The skin is the largest detoxification organ thru which toxins can be drawn out. After a long soak, you will feel revived and rejuvenated!  Its pretty amazing!
